recipesJson.name: Whipped Cookie
recipesJson.author: Kemmo
recipesJson.description: Simply just whipped cream and sugar cookies. It's a little floral off the shake but still good, best after a 5 day steep. Have at it!

reviews.text: Not a bad mix by any means... Pretty delicate and light... You get the sugar cookie with a light airy whipped center... Didn't really find anything floral with it, gotta wait a couple days for the alcohol to settle of the sugar cookie but that's about it... Not bad! üëçüëç
